attributes.action: STOP THE CLOSURE OF GRANGE HILL SCHOOL
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The school has had a major influence on the lifes on many school children, all of which have gone on to better things in life. Just look at Tucker - became a bloody good Police man.
The discipine the teachers gave was often hard but fair - bully baxter, Mr Bronson to name a few... Stop this now.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
